name: Bedside Lamp with Touch Sensor
summary_features: Touch-Operated with vibrant and immersive light
2 IN 1-Touch Sensor activates auto-cycling mode with 256 stunning colors
Eco-friendly low power consumption design for longer lifespan (rated at 35,000 hours)
Package Contents: 1 x HandAcc RBG256 Smart LED Atmosphere Bedside Lamp, 1 x UL Verified AC Adapter, 1 x User manual (Multi-language)
features: ONE TOUCH-The Touch-Operated LT-T6 Atmosphere Bedside Lamp takes LED lighting to the next level with a vibrant and immersive lightshow. Light up a bright new world in sensational style.

2 IN 1-Touch Sensor activates auto-cycling mode with 256 stunning colors for an intense, mesmerizing lighting experience; light colors can be set to WHITE LIGHT for normal usage, AUTO CYCLE for sensational or ROOM-FILLING light.

Eco-friendly low power consumption design for longer lifespan (rated at 35,000 hours). With a minimalist design and at 9 inch tall with a compact, space-saving footprint, less is so much more. And it's light too at just 1.5lb (680g).

Perfect for students in dorms, partygoers at celebrations, families at special events, children and for relaxing. Especially ideal as holiday GIFT, birthday present, housewarming gift or simply as a personal treat.

Package Contents: 1 x HandAcc RBG256 Smart LED Atmosphere Bedside Lamp, 1 x UL Verified AC Adapter, 1 x User manual (Multi-language), full 24 Month Worry-Free Warranty Card & 100% Customer Satisfaction.

name: Waterproof Floating Cellphone Case
summary_features: Made of high density polyethylene with secure dual swivel lock and sealable closure clip
Universal size fits all smartphones up to 5.5", also credit card, wallet and money
IPX8 complaint. Support continual submersion in water under 15m for 30 minutes
features: Made of high density polyethylene. The secure dual swivel lock and sealable closure clip design providing security, dependability, and ease of use
Universal size fits all smartphones up to 5.5 inch, also credit card, wallet and money when fishing, swimming, boating,skating, diving or other outdoor sports
The waterproof bag is certified by IPX8 which means that the equipment is suitable for continual submersion in water under 15m for 30 minutes
The transparent and slim cover allows you to make phone call,take pictures and check emails without removing your device from the case bag even underwater
Comes with an armband and neck strap, give you more choice to carry the case. If you have any issues with the case bag please contact us to resolve

Premium aluminum finish matches the look and feel of your Mac
No external power required, built-in surge protection keep your devices and data safe

features: Expands your PC with three USB3.0 ports and one RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet port. USB 3.0 male A to RJ45 female adapter supporting 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet.
IEEE 802.3, 802.3u, and 802.3ab compatible. Supports full duplex operation with IEEE 802.3x flow control.
Premium aluminum finish matches the look and feel of your MacBook. No external power required, built-in surge protection keep your devices and data safe.

After initial driver installation (CD included), allows for plug and play ability. On Windows, a driver needs to be manually installed to enable Ethernet connection. No drivers required for Data ports on all compatible systems.

name: Desk-Clamp LED Lamp with Touch-Sensitive Control (white)
summary_name: Desk-Clamp LED Lamp with Touch-Sensitive Control (white)
summary_features: Handy desk clamp LED lamp. Energy efficient and safe to use with low voltage wire
LARGE & LABOR-SAVING STURDY clip as GREAT SPACE SAVER
3-LEVEL DIMMER TOUCH CONTROL, BRIGHTER, MORE ENERGY-SAVING
Adjustable Color Temperature, The smooth light output doesn't cast hard shadows which helps to protect your eyes
CLAMP-ON LIGHT EXTRA LONG GOOSE-NECK
features: HANDY DESK LAMP CLIP Very EASY to use and Doesn't get much hot like other models! Be SAFE because it's low voltage wire. Designed for the headboard, working studio, reading or makeup application

LARGE & LABOR-SAVING STURDY clip as GREAT SPACE SAVER: Great feature that many of the other lights didn't have. very STRONG and will NOT scratch the surface it is attached to, Good clip that attaches to a wide variety of surfaces. By ergonomic design, can be operated easily by those with weaker hands. Clamp size 5.12 * 2.20. The clip-on light, NOT contain a battery, BUT plugs into a USB port

3-LEVEL DIMMER TOUCH CONTROL, BRIGHTER, MORE ENERGY-SAVING: A nice bedside clamp-on light to read by. Compared to some other 7W clip on lamps that only produce 170lux at 40cm our 5W lamp provides 374lux! That's brighter and with a 60% power reduction!
Adjustable Color Temperature, The smooth light output doesn't cast hard shadows which helps to protect your eyes

CLAMP-ON LIGHT EXTRA LONG GOOSE-NECK: Ultimate Flexibility Perfect for reading in bed. Great terrific little lamp for the office or desk. The high-quality silicone flexible neck, feels exquisite in your hand, the premium quality neck will bend freely creating no noise. The light output is wide with no bright spots making it the perfect light for you
